improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: Get detailed WHOIS records for domains, including registrar information, expiration dates, name servers, and more. Our API provides accurate and up-to-date WHOIS data, making it an essential tool for domain owners, developers, and researchers who need to extract specific details from WHOIS records. With our advanced features, you can easily retrieve the registration info, name servers, and contact details for any domain. Get precise control over the output format with options for JSON or XML.
name: domain_whois_lookup_api_pro_ninja_master
